Name: Increasing the rates of horse drawn cabs.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to increasing the rates of horse drawn cabs.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Consumer Affairs
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Section 20-380 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended to read as follows:
§20-380.  Rates of horse drawn cabs.  The amount to be charged and collected for the use of a horse drawn cab by one or more passengers shall be the total of the following items: [thirty-four] fifty-four dollars for the first half-hour or fraction, the fraction of the half-hour shall be at the passenger’s option, and [ten] twenty dollars for each additional fifteen minutes thereafter.
	§2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.


LS #3953
LC
11/16/07
